title: 2019 ROOKIE RB EVALUATIONS; XFL Week 2 Preview (02/13 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
It's time to dissect the 2019 rookie RB class! We start by making our pick for which 2019 rookie has the most value moving forward (6:00). ... Then we're diving deep into the 2019 performances of the rookie RBs (6:55), including Josh Jacobs, Miles Sanders, Devin Singletary and David Montgomery. Did Jacobs show us enough to be considered a top 10 RB? Can Montgomery bounce back from a disappointing rookie campaign? And we take a much longer look at the rest of the rookie RB class ... Matthew Stafford trade rumors are put to a halt (36:30) and Jameis Winston got lasik eye surgery (38:30). ... We're joined by Emory Hunt for an XFL Week 2 preview (40:00), with DFS picks, review of Week 1 target shares and more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Let's review the rookie RB performances and look ahead to 2020 and beyond. And we talk more XFL with Emory Hunt.
